languages.text: Переживший ужасы Комморры гвардеец убеждает мятежников, что их самотверженный труд важен для борьбы с ксеносами. Рабочие впечатлены историей Вигастиса и возвращаются к непосильной работе во имя победы Человечества.

The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.
languages.original_text: Переживший ужасы Комморры гвардеец убеждает мятежников, что их самотверженный труд важен для борьбы с ксеносами. Рабочие впечатлены историей Вигастиса и возвращаются к непосильной работе во имя победы Человечества.

traits.locale_text: The Guardsman who has survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.
Having survived the horrors of Commorragh, the Guardsman finds a common tongue with the rebels, and the uprising is averted without casualties.

The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.
Having survived the horrors of Commorragh, the Guardsman finds a common tongue with the rebels, and the uprising is averted without casualties.

The Guardsman who has survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

languages.text: La garde ayant survécu aux horreurs de Commorragh parvient à convaincre les rebelles de l'importance de leur travail dans la lutte contre les xénos. Impressionnés par l'histoire de Vigastes, les ouvriers retournent s'échiner à la tâche au nom de la victoire de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

traits.locale_text: La garde ayant survécu aux horreurs de Commorragh parvient à convaincre les rebelles de l'importance de leur travail dans la lutte contre les xénos. Impressionnés par l'histoire de Vigastes, les ouvriers retournent s'échiner à la tâche au nom de la victoire de l'humanité.

languages.text: コモラフでの惨劇を生き延びたガーズマンは、異種族との戦いにおける労働の重要性を反乱軍に説く。ヴィガステスの話に感銘を受けた労働者たちは、人類の勝利のために再び身を粉にして働くようになった。
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

traits.locale_text: コモラフでの惨劇を生き延びたガーズマンは、異種族との戦いにおける労働の重要性を反乱軍に説く。ヴィガステスの話に感銘を受けた労働者たちは、人類の勝利のために再び身を粉にして働くようになった。

languages.text: 在科摩罗幸存下来的军士说服了叛军，让他们意识到为了战胜异形，足够的劳动力必不可少。维加斯特的故事触动了所有工人，他们再次回到了自己的工作岗位上，为了人类的胜利而奋斗。
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

traits.locale_text: 在科摩罗幸存下来的军士说服了叛军，让他们意识到为了战胜异形，足够的劳动力必不可少。维加斯特的故事触动了所有工人，他们再次回到了自己的工作岗位上，为了人类的胜利而奋斗。

languages.text: El guardia que sobrevivió a los horrores de Commorragh convence a los rebeldes de la importancia del trabajo duro en la lucha contra los xenos. Inspirados por la historia de Vigastes, los trabajadores vuelven a deslomarse en nombre de la victoria de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

traits.locale_text: El guardia que sobrevivió a los horrores de Commorragh convence a los rebeldes de la importancia del trabajo duro en la lucha contra los xenos. Inspirados por la historia de Vigastes, los trabajadores vuelven a deslomarse en nombre de la victoria de la Humanidad.

languages.text: Der Soldat, der das Grauen von Commorragh überlebt hat, überzeugt die Rebellen, wie wichtig Arbeitskräfte für den Kampf gegen die Xenos sind. Von Vigastes' Geschichte beeindruckt nehmen die Arbeiter ihre Plackerei sofort wieder auf, alles für den Sieg der Menschheit.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.

traits.locale_text: Der Soldat, der das Grauen von Commorragh überlebt hat, überzeugt die Rebellen, wie wichtig Arbeitskräfte für den Kampf gegen die Xenos sind. Von Vigastes' Geschichte beeindruckt nehmen die Arbeiter ihre Plackerei sofort wieder auf, alles für den Sieg der Menschheit.

languages.text: Commorragh'ın dehşetinden sağ çıkan Muhafız, isyancıları zenolara karşı mücadelede çalışmanın önemine ikna ediyor. Vigastes'in hikâyesinden etkilenen işçiler, İnsanlığın zaferi adına ter dökmeye geri dönüyorlar.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman who survived the horrors of Commorragh convinces the rebels of the importance of labour in the fight against the xenos. Impressed by Vigastes's story, the workers go back to breaking their backs in the name of Humanity's victory.
